name: La Maledizione dell'Uccello Serpente
description:
Welcome to the valley of the Sacred Mountains
... don't worry if you are a bit late, because (as they say in our family) there is always a cousin a few steps behind.
You are headed to the Black Wood Monastery, a millenary building whose foundation is attributed to the Holy Hermit.
It is the cold autumn of 1987, you have decided, with your cousins, to make a pilgrimage excursion to the Monastery.
... but we better do not reveal too much information by now: then set out and climb the first steps to access the Monastery.
Unfortunately you are a little late, and the group moved on....

La Maledizione dell'Uccello Serpente (the Curse of the SnakeBird) is a 2D RPG game with a fantasy setting and a compelling story.

Warning: the game is in Italian.
